events.title: Opening Match: Germany vs Costa Rica
events.description: Tournament opens with host Germany defeating Costa Rica 4-2 in Munich. Phillip Lahm scores after 6 minutes.

events.title: Poland vs Ecuador
events.description: Ecuador wins 2-0 in Group A. Carlos Tenorio scores both goals.

events.title: England vs Paraguay
events.description: England wins 1-0 thanks to a Carlos Gamarra own goal in the 3rd minute.

events.title: Argentina vs Côte d'Ivoire
events.description: Argentina dominates 2-1. Hernan Crespo scores twice.

events.title: Brazil vs Croatia
events.description: Brazil wins 1-0. Kaka scores the only goal in the opening match of Group F.

events.title: Italy vs Ghana
events.description: Italy wins 2-0 in their Group E opener. Andrea Pirlo scores a spectacular goal from distance.

events.title: Spain vs Ukraine
events.description: Spain wins 4-0 in dominant fashion. David Villa scores a hat-trick.

events.title: Netherlands vs Serbia and Montenegro
events.description: Netherlands wins 1-0 with an Arjen Robben goal.

events.title: Mexico vs Iran
events.description: Mexico wins 3-1. Omar Bravo scores twice for El Tri.

events.title: Italy vs USA - Battle of Nuremberg
events.description: Italy draws 1-1 with USA in a match featuring 3 red cards and 5 yellow cards. One of the most controversial matches of the tournament.

events.title: Argentina vs Serbia and Montenegro
events.description: Argentina wins 6-0, the largest margin of victory in the tournament. Lionel Messi makes his World Cup debut.

events.title: Germany vs Ecuador
events.description: Germany wins 3-0 to secure progression to knockout stages. Miroslav Klose scores twice.

events.title: England vs Sweden
events.description: England draws 2-2. Joe Cole scores a spectacular volley, one of the goals of the tournament.

events.title: Brazil vs Japan
events.description: Brazil wins 4-1 to top Group F. Ronaldo scores twice to move within one of Gerd Müller's World Cup goal record.

events.title: Italy vs Czech Republic
events.description: Italy wins 2-0 to top Group E. Marco Materazzi and Filippo Inzaghi score.

events.title: Round of 16: Germany vs Sweden
events.description: Germany wins 2-0. Lukas Podolski scores both goals to send Germany through to quarter-finals.

events.title: Round of 16: Argentina vs Mexico
events.description: Argentina wins 2-1 in extra time. Maxi Rodriguez scores a stunning volley in the 98th minute.

events.title: Round of 16: England vs Ecuador
events.description: England wins 1-0. David Beckham's free kick goal sends England to quarter-finals.

events.title: Round of 16: Portugal vs Netherlands
events.description: Portugal wins 1-0 in the 'Battle of Nuremberg Part 2'. Match features 16 yellow cards and 4 red cards, setting a World Cup record.

events.title: Round of 16: Italy vs Australia
events.description: Italy wins 1-0 with a controversial last-minute penalty converted by Francesco Totti in the 95th minute.

events.title: Round of 16: Switzerland vs Ukraine
events.description: Ukraine wins on penalties (3-0) after 0-0 draw. First scoreless penalty shootout in World Cup history.

events.title: Round of 16: Brazil vs Ghana
events.description: Brazil wins 3-0. Ronaldo scores his 15th World Cup goal, breaking the all-time record.

events.title: Round of 16: Spain vs France
events.description: France wins 3-1. Zinedine Zidane dominates midfield in one of his finest World Cup performances.

events.title: Quarter-Final: Germany vs Argentina
events.description: Germany wins on penalties (4-2) after 1-1 draw. Jens Lehmann saves two penalties with note card tactics.

events.title: Quarter-Final: Italy vs Ukraine
events.description: Italy wins 3-0. Gianluca Zambrotta, Luca Toni, and substitute Alessandro Del Piero score.

events.title: Quarter-Final: England vs Portugal
events.description: Portugal wins on penalties (3-1) after 0-0 draw. Cristiano Ronaldo winks after Wayne Rooney red card in controversial moment.

events.title: Quarter-Final: Brazil vs France
events.description: France wins 1-0. Thierry Henry scores from a quickly-taken free kick while Roberto Carlos ties his shoe. Defending champions eliminated.

events.title: Semi-Final: Germany vs Italy
events.description: Italy wins 2-0 in extra time with goals from Fabio Grosso (119') and Alessandro Del Piero (121'). Germany's dream ends in heartbreak.

events.title: Semi-Final: Portugal vs France
events.description: France wins 1-0. Zinedine Zidane's penalty in the 33rd minute sends France to the final.

events.title: Third Place Play-off: Germany vs Portugal
events.description: Germany wins 3-1 to secure third place. Bastian Schweinsteiger scores twice. Home fans celebrate bronze medal.

events.title: Final: Italy vs France
events.description: Italy wins on penalties (5-3) after 1-1 draw. Zidane's headbutt on Materazzi in extra time overshadows the final. Italy claims their 4th World Cup title.

events.title: Zidane Opens Scoring
events.description: Zinedine Zidane converts a penalty with a Panenka chip for his 31st international goal.

events.title: Materazzi Equalizes
events.description: Marco Materazzi heads in Andrea Pirlo's corner to make it 1-1.

events.title: The Headbutt
events.description: Zinedine Zidane headbutts Marco Materazzi in the chest and is sent off with a red card in his final professional match. One of the most shocking moments in World Cup history.

events.title: Italy Wins Penalty Shootout
events.description: Italy wins the penalty shootout 5-3. Fabio Grosso scores the winning penalty. Italy are world champions for the 4th time.

events.title: Trophy Presentation
events.description: Italy captain Fabio Cannavaro lifts the FIFA World Cup trophy. Germany 2006 concludes as one of the most memorable tournaments in history.
